verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w See|strong="H2009"\w* \w how|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w rising|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w becoming|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w torrent|strong="H5158"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w fullness|strong="H4393"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w wail|strong="H3213"\w*

\w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w galloping|strong="H8161"\w* \w hooves|strong="H6541"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w stallions|strong="H7393"\w*, \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w rumbling|strong="H7494"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* clatter \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*. \w The|strong="H3027"\w* fathers \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w back|strong="H6437"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hang limp.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7703"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w* \w ally|strong="H5826"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7703"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* coasts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Caphtor|strong="H3731"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* people \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w shave|strong="H1413"\w* \w their|strong="H5704"\w* heads \w in|strong="H7611"\w* mourning; Ashkelon \w will|strong="H5704"\w* be \w silenced|strong="H1820"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w their|strong="H5704"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, \w how|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w gash|strong="H1413"\w* yourself?

‘\w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*? Return \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w*; \w cease|strong="H1826"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w still|strong="H1826"\w*!’

How can \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*? \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* Ashkelon \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w shore|strong="H2348"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* coastland.”
